item.title: Setting up Nagios Server to Remotely Server on Debian
item.description: Step 1. Installing packages We have one server for monitoring (eg. myoneserver). [client] # aptitude install nagios-nrpe-server nagios-plugins And one server to view statistics. [server] # aptitude install nagios-nrpe-plugin nagios-plugins nagios3 Step 2. Configuring the server for monitoring [client] Edit /etc/nagios/nrpe.conf. # nano /etc/nagios/nrpe.conf Set the server_address to the IP address you want NRPE to bind to on the Untangle server.Â If you want it to bind to all addresses, leave this command commented out.
